statements: SELECT * FROM ProductionScheduling;
SELECT id, product_name, production_date FROM ProductionScheduling WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, production_date, end_time FROM ProductionScheduling WHERE production_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ProductionScheduling ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, resource_allocation FROM ProductionScheduling ORDER BY resource_allocation ASC, production_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductionScheduling WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-01-31';
SELECT product_name, production_date, resource_allocation FROM ProductionScheduling WHERE resource_allocation > 50 ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, end_time FROM ProductionScheduling WHERE start_time < '12:00:00' AND end_time > '15:00:00';
SELECT * FROM ProductionScheduling WHERE product_name LIKE '%chair%' AND resource_allocation >= 100 ORDER BY production_date ASC, start_time ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM ProductionScheduling WHERE product_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ProductionSchedule ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT id, product_name, schedule_date FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE schedule_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT resource_name, allocation_date, allocation_status FROM ResourceAllocation WHERE allocation_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, product_name, schedule_date FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE quantity >= 50 AND product_name LIKE '%Shoes%' ORDER BY schedule_date ASC;

SELECT rs.resource_name, ra.allocation_date FROM ResourceAllocation AS ra INNER JOIN ProductionSchedule AS ps ON ra.resource_id = ps.id INNER JOIN ResourceAllocation AS rs ON ra.resource_id = rs.id WHERE ra.allocation_status = 'allocated' ORDER BY ra.allocation_date DESC;

SELECT ps.product_name, COUNT(ra.id) AS resource_count FROM ProductionSchedule AS ps LEFT JOIN ResourceAllocation AS ra ON ps.id = ra.resource_id GROUP BY ps.product_name HAVING resource_count > 0 ORDER BY resource_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, start_time FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE end_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, allocated_quantity FROM ResourceAllocation;
SELECT algorithm_name, optimization_type FROM OptimizationAlgorithms WHERE id < 5;
SELECT * FROM ProductionSchedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_time DESC;
SELECT product_name, start_time, end_time FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE product_name LIKE '%Widget%' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT resource_name, allocated_quantity FROM ResourceAllocation WHERE resource_type = 'Labor' ORDER BY allocated_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM OptimizationAlgorithms WHERE optimization_type = 'Performance' ORDER BY id;
SELECT algorithm_name, algorithm_description FROM OptimizationAlgorithms WHERE algorithm_name = 'Genetic Algorithm';
SELECT * FROM production_schedule;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM production_schedule WHERE daily_production_goal > 100;
SELECT efficiency_score, efficiency_date FROM production_efficiency ORDER BY efficiency_date DESC;
SELECT resource_name, available_quantity FROM resource_allocation WHERE resource_type = 'human';
SELECT product_name, daily_production_goal FROM production_schedule WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM production_schedule ORDER BY production_date DESC, daily_production_goal ASC
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM production_schedule WHERE daily_production_goal > 100 ORDER BY production_date
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM resource_allocation WHERE available_quantity >= 50
SELECT * FROM optimization_results WHERE optimization_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY optimization_timestamp DESC

SELECT production_schedule.product_name, production_efficiency.efficiency_score FROM production_schedule JOIN production_efficiency ON production_schedule.schedule_id = production_efficiency.schedule_id
SELECT * FROM production_schedule;
SELECT product_name, start_date, end_date FROM production_schedule ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS resource_count FROM resource_allocation WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT optimization_name, optimization_date FROM schedule_optimization WHERE optimization_type = 'Batch';
SELECT capacity_name, production_limit FROM production_capacity WHERE capacity_type = 'Machine' AND production_limit > 50;
SELECT * FROM production_schedule ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, end_date FROM production_schedule WHERE allocated_resources > 100 ORDER BY production_id
SELECT MAX(production_id) AS max_production_id, MIN(allocated_resources) AS min_allocated_resources FROM production_schedule
SELECT * FROM resource_allocation WHERE resource_type = 'Raw Material' AND quantity > 500 ORDER BY resource_id DESC
SELECT optimization_name FROM schedule_optimization WHERE optimization_type = 'Efficiency' ORDER BY optimization_date
